message.body: Is this still being developed @ computerfreak ?

Well, nice. yeah, those guys trolling around can continue - as long as we don't have a real solution, just let them do their thing. I personally don't care and they are speaking their mind in some kind of way. It's not useful, however I don't think that it degrades the 0net experience :)
